amendment.description: To strike section 833, relating to waiver authority for domestic source or content requirements.

action.text: Amendment SA 725 was rendered moot when Amendment SA 783 was agreed to.
Amendment SA 725 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S6821-6823, S6827; text: CR S6821) To strike section 833, relating to waiver authority for domestic source or content requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 725 proposed by Senator Dayton.
